p: In addition to the hypomethylation of the Î±-synuclein gene, the epigenetic regulation of other genes associated with DLB has been proposed, including ataxin 2 (ATXN2), deglycase PARK7 and parkin (PRKN) [ 24]. Furthermore, changes in H3 histone acetylation might also contribute to LBD development [ 24]. Since epigenetic modifications in DLB patients are reversible and dynamic, they are used as appropriate targets for DLB treatment.
